snippet.title: MUST SEE: Melania and Barron Trump Sing "In God's Light We Stand" Together!
snippet.description:
In God's Light We Stand

Check us out on Spotify! https://open.spotify.com/album/3y1CZVxPBVqYl2ljdNVWno?si=lLRWLYbeQcuXD9TQDeKi7A

⬇️⬇️⬇️ Watch more videos below! ⬇️⬇️⬇️
https://youtu.be/WBHJZs8ZeFQ
https://youtu.be/GAdihLnAiXk
https://youtu.be/SZZW8YMZlMg?si=kP7ZE5s5fhhjjpX2
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hq_JjAodbY0

Lyrics:
[Verse 1 – Melania]
I have walked through the halls of power,
Seen the world through different eyes,
But nothing shines as bright to me
As the love that fills the skies.

[Verse 2 – Barron]
I’ve grown up in the public view,
With voices loud, but one rings true.
Through every trial, through every test,
I know that God knows what is best.

[Chorus – Melania and Barron]
Oh, in God's light we stand,
Holding tight to His hand.
Through the storms, through the night,
He’s our truth, He’s our guide.
With His grace, we are strong,
In His love, we belong.

[Verse 3 – Melania]
Some may chase the gold and glory,
But my heart is set above.
Faith is more than just a story,
It’s a never-ending love.

[Verse 4 – Barron]
I don’t need the world to praise me,
Just the Father’s love alone.
Every step He walks beside me,
Every battle He has won.

[Chorus – Melania and Barron]
Oh, in God's light we stand,
Holding tight to His hand.
Through the storms, through the night,
He’s our truth, He’s our guide.
With His grace, we are strong,
In His love, we belong.

[Bridge – Melania]
Oh, I pray for peace and kindness,
Let His mercy lead the way.

[Bridge – Barron]
With my voice, I’ll stand for justice,
I will trust Him every day.

[Chorus – Melania and Barron]
Oh, in God's light we stand,
Holding tight to His hand.
Through the storms, through the night,
He’s our truth, He’s our guide.
With His grace, we are strong,
In His love, we belong.

[Outro – Melania and Barron]
So we walk in faith, not fear,
God is always near.
With His love, we carry on,
In His grace, we are strong.


All content, including references to real individuals, is created for entertainment purposes only. Any resemblance to actual persons, living or deceased, is purely coincidental or used in a satirical, transformative, or fictional context. This content is not intended to defame, embellish, misrepresent, or harm the reputation of any individual. No endorsement or affiliation is implied unless explicitly stated.
